00008 void broadcast(const last_letter_msgs::SimStates& states){
00009         static tf::TransformBroadcaster broadcaster;
00010         tf::Transform statesTf;
00011 
00012         statesTf.setOrigin( tf::Vector3(states.pose.position.x, states.pose.position.y, states.pose.position.z));
00013         statesTf.setRotation( tf::Quaternion(states.pose.orientation.x,states.pose.orientation.y,states.pose.orientation.z,states.pose.orientation.w));
00014         broadcaster.sendTransform(tf::StampedTransform(statesTf, states.header.stamp, "map", "base_link"));
00015 
00016         }
00017 
00018 
00019 int main(int argc, char **argv){
00020         ros::init(argc,argv,"state_publisher");
00021         ros::NodeHandle n;
00022         ros::Subscriber sub = n.subscribe("states",1000, broadcast);
00023         while (ros::ok())
00024         {
00025                 ros::spin();
00026         }
00027         return 0;
00028 }
